channel.title: Runserver
channel.description:
hi.
I have recently started playing about with rs2 servers and today i was adding in some code... Compiles fine. So i wanted to try out the beast so clicked on runserver.bat
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:[/code]
RAWR! this has been happening for a bit now and is annoying. I tried running my server by opening cmd prompt. Go to the location of my server files... runserver.bat and starts working but then i get
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:[/code]
RAWR. and yes i am n00by
